column4: anyone care to take a stab at helping me cool down my laptop... it's been cleaned out and cputemp sits at appx 95 not under load? running 12.04 64 bit
I had a sneaking suspicion... any work-around to kill the nvidia
its far from good in Linux with switching rubbish and is best just avoided imho
agreed as this thing is more of a panini grill than a laptop
I tried bumblebee in the past but had no success with the temp going down
however I'm willing to give it another go here
the commands in the hybrid guide may help
I will most certainly take a look at both, tyvm
I will get back to you in a bit here, temp already up to 98
